name: Christ Carrying the Cross
description: Christ Carrying the Cross; Juan de Juanes (Juan Maçip) (Spanish, about 1510 - 1579); about 1560; Pen and brown ink and brown wash over black chalk; the upper left and right corners trimmed diagonally and made up; 21 x 34.8 cm (8 1/4 x 13 11/16 in.); 94.GA.95; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Christ Carrying the Cross
medium: Pen and brown ink and brown wash over black chalk; the upper left and right corners trimmed diagonally and made up
